summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, granting nonexclusive easements to James B. McPherson and Pearl L. McPherson, husband and wife, and Donald R. Orndorff and Wanda V. Ordnoroff, husband and wife, for ingress and egress across a portion of the City's fee owned transmission line right-of-way in the vicinity of South 118th Street in King County, Washington. (P.M. \#230411-1-303).
